title: CircleCI build fails with `No module named 'numpy'`
body:

https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/mlflow/mlflow/2847/workflows/14f9de2f-e424-49cd-bd46-1b24d0677991/jobs/2859

It looks like the new dependency resolver in pip 20.3 tries to determine which `scipy` version is compatible with other packages and hit a very old one ([0.12.1](https://pypi.org/project/scipy/0.12.1/)) which contains a bug.
